overview:
Adam founded his award winning interactive agency Mission E-Commerce in 2001. Under his direction and cutting edge service suite, the MissionE team has helped companies like Disney, Kimberly Clark, 24 Hour Fitness, Hewlett Packard, Bacardi, American Standard along with over 2000 small businesses and start-ups. They have won 11 awards for their work including the DBI best practices award.

Since 2005, Adam has been responsible for incubating several Web 2.0 successes, such as the popular music search engine www.dizzler.com currently boasting over 4.3 million members and 150 million songs played using their technology per month.

Currently Adam is revolutionizing U.S. legal services through a technology that allows for the automated creation of thousands of legal forms, contracts and agreements as the CTO & Co-founder of www.legalace.com
